title: serverless-cdk serve executor
description: Wrapper around the 'sam local start-lambda' command. If 'api' is set to true 'sam local start-api' is used instead. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-lambda.html and https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-api.html)

terraformDirectory.description: The path of the directory where the '*.tf' files are stored.

api.description: Used to test Lambda functions that are invoked by an AWS API Gateway endpoint. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-api.html)

args.description: Used to provide additional arguments to the SAM CLI. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-lambda.html and https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-api.html)

shell.description: Shell to execute the command with. Uses '/bin/sh' on Unix, and process.env.ComSpec on Windows, if no shell is specified.
